about_the_game:
You are trapped in a looping office corridor.

Don't overlook any anomalies.
If you see an anomaly, run back to the entrance.
If you don't see any anomalies, escape through the exit.

Only 10 correct predictions in a row will allow you to escape.

Backrooms Anomaly is a psychological horror game that tests your perception and attention to detail. Set in an endless office corridor inspired by the legendary Backrooms, you'll find yourself surrounded by yellowed wallpaper, buzzing fluorescent lights, and the unsettling feeling that something isn't quite right. A mysterious figure in a hazmat suit patrols these halls, adding to the tension as you work to uncover the truth.

Key Features:

- Explore a meticulously crafted looping Backrooms environment
- Spot subtle changes in the environment from posters to furniture
- Atmospheric sound design with position-based ambient audio
- VHS camcorder aesthetic enhances the unsettling atmosphere
- Multiple playthroughs encouraged to discover all anomalies
- Counter system tracking your discoveries
- Two different ending

Your mission is to carefully study your surroundings as you navigate the endless corridor. When you notice something has changed - be it a misplaced object, altered text, or something more unsettling - return to the entrance to record your discovery. If everything appears normal, proceed cautiously to the exit, but beware, only 10 correct predictions in a row will allow you to escape. Will you notice enough anomalies to escape, or become another permanent resident of these endless halls?

legal_notice: Inspired by the concept of the Backrooms, this is a standalone game that, while drawing inspiration from the wider Backrooms phenomenon, has no connection to Kane Pixels' work or the Backrooms Wiki and Fandom.
name: BACKROOMS ANOMALY

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R7 260x (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Explore a looping corridor filled with anomalies. Walk through the fluorescent-lit backrooms environment, examine your surroundings, and spot subtle changes in reality.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Assamese, Azerbaijani, Bangla, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Cherokee, Croatian, Dari, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, K'iche', Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Konkani, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Odia, Persian, Punjabi (Gurmukhi), Punjabi (Shahmukhi), Quechua, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Sorani, Sotho, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Tigrinya, Tswana, Turkmen, Urdu, Uyghur, Uzbek, Valencian, Welsh, Wolof, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
